doc:
Bob Ogle https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bob_Ogle 0 Robert Allen Ogle (May 28, 1926 – February 25, 1984), known as Bob Ogle, was an American voice actor, animator and writer. Most characters he voiced are performed in the style of Bill Thompson's character Wallace Wimple from Fibber McGee and Molly. Ogle died suddenly of natural causes in February 1984 during the production of Shirt Tales. Robert_Allen_Ogle ( May_28_,_1926 – February_25_,_1984 ) , known as Bob_Ogle , was an_American_voice_actor , animator_and_writer . Most_characters he voiced are_performed in the_style of Bill_Thompson 's_character_Wallace_Wimple from Fibber_McGee_and_Molly . Ogle died suddenly of natural_causes in February_1984 during the_production of Shirt_Tales .
